Look: [* Whimsical $(this.trait:gem:shape) $(this.trait:gem:material)s comprise half the decorative motif of the bodice brooch.

Core:Properties.Core:Property: X[S] This piece of jewelry is worn centrally upon a bodice or gown with \ \$(this.trait:color) \$(this.trait:material) pin.\ It features \ \{? \| \$(this.trait:gempieces:material) \| \$(this.trait:gempieces:material) encrusted, decorative motif frame displaying intricate \$(this.trait:color) \$(this.trait:material) filigree knots and whimsical swirls set with the tiniest of melee \$(this.trait:gempieces:color) \$(this.trait:gempieces:material)s lining each curve, and swirl. \| decorative motif frame displaying intricate \$(this.trait:color) \$(this.trait:material) filigree knots and whimsical swirls.\}\\{? \| \$(this.trait:gem:material) \|The elaborate frame surrounds a large \$(this.trait:gem:shape) \$(this.trait:gem:color) \$(this.trait:gem:material) that acts as the centerpiece of the \$(this.trait:brief).\} \{? \| \$(this.trait:bead:material) \| A trio of \$(this.trait:bead:color) \$(this.trait:bead:material) \$(this.trait:bead:type)s dangle upon fine \$(this.trait:material) pins from the lowest portion of the frame.\}
